title: Old lead type
content:
My father and grandfather, and great-grandfather had printing businesses and now we have quite a lot of old lead type that we need to sell. I am open to any ideas. Thank you.  
Brenda
author: keirgirl

comments.content: Contact [Pyramid Atlantic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080913040116/http:/www.pyramidatlanticartcenter.org/) in Silver Spring, it’s a big book arts/printing shop that might be able to use some of it or help find a home for it. I would love to come out and take a look at what you’re selling (I’m in DC), drop me a line at [james.puckett@gmail.com](mailto:james.puckett@gmail.com)
Drop a lint to James, and to me too :) agletterpress[at]gmail.com.
